title: Trailblazer pickaxe

content:
Trailblazer pickaxe was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
For the cosmetic dragon pickaxe skin, see Dragon pickaxe (or) (Trailblazer). For the cosmetic infernal pickaxe skin, see Infernal pickaxe (or).
Trailblazer pickaxe

Item ID25112

The Trailblazer pickaxe was an item obtained in the Trailblazer League upon unlocking the Infernal Gathering relic. As the relic gives the player the Trailblazer pickaxe, as well as the axe and harpoon, it must be unlocked in a bank.

With no requirement to use and equip, the Trailblazer pickaxe functions as a crystal pickaxe with similar effects to an infernal pickaxe, in which any ore mined will be smelted into a metal bar (if applicable), granting Smithing experience regardless of level requirements. The smelting effect works without the use of coal. Using the pickaxe on iron or mithril rocks, for example, will give the player steel and mithril bars directly without needing to mine coal. The pickaxe also inherits the crystal pickaxe's special attack. If used with the Endless Harvest relic, two bars will be placed in the player's bank (if they have space) and they will receive Smithing experience for both. The Trailblazer pickaxe is destroyed upon death.

If players lose the pickaxe, they can reclaim it from the Leagues Tutor in Lumbridge.

[[File:Trailblazer pickaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Trailblazer pickaxe''' was an item obtained in the [[Trailblazer League]] upon unlocking the [[Infernal Gathering]] relic. As the relic gives the player the Trailblazer pickaxe, as well as the [[Trailblazer axe|axe]] and [[Trailblazer harpoon|harpoon]], it must be unlocked in a [[bank]].

With no requirement to use and equip, the Trailblazer pickaxe functions as a [[crystal pickaxe]] with similar effects to an [[infernal pickaxe]], in which any ore mined will be smelted into a metal bar (if applicable), granting [[Smithing]] experience regardless of level requirements. The smelting effect works without the use of coal. Using the pickaxe on iron or mithril rocks, for example, will give the player steel and mithril bars directly without needing to mine coal. The pickaxe also inherits the crystal pickaxe's [[special attack]]. If used with the [[Endless Harvest]] relic, two bars will be placed in the player's bank (if they have space) and they will receive Smithing experience for both. The Trailblazer pickaxe is destroyed upon [[death]].

If players lose the pickaxe, they can reclaim it from the [[Leagues Tutor]] in [[Lumbridge]].
